title: Sony WH-1000XM5 could offer up to 40 hours of battery life and even better ANC
content:
Sony makes some of the best noise-cancellation headphones on the market. The companyâ€™s current flagship headphones Sony WH-1000XM4 have garnered much admiration from all around for offering the best in class ANC, amazing sound quality, and great battery life. There have been rumors that the Japanese electronics giant is gearing up to launch the WH-1000XM5,

The post Sony WH-1000XM5 could offer up to 40 hours of battery life and even better ANC appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Thanks to a new leak we have our first look at the Sony WH-1000XM5. It features an updated design that looks much cleaner and minimal than WH-1000XM4.
